temporaryTool.description: Sends a specified amount of SAHEL token from the user's current Programmatic Key Pair (PKP) address. The recipient can be specified by their name (if they are a known prenu with a linked wallet) or by their direct ETH address. If no recipient is specified, it defaults to the user's primary Guardian EOA address.

schema.description: The amount of token to send (e.g., "0.1").
Optional. The name of the recipient (must be a known prenu with a linked wallet address) or their direct ETH address. If omitted, defaults to the user's Guardian EOA.
